item.description:
For people who around chinatown. Interested in Chinese Cultural,and meet friends. gives everyone an opportunity to come and make new friends, practice their Chinese or English, and enjoy dinner with us. Bring your friends, and come by, relax, practice in either language of your choice, and enjoy being part of our growing community.

We look forward to seeing you there! We gonna be there from 6pm to 8pm

Take orange line to chinatown or new england medical center, or take green line to boylston station.

For more info. please check http://www.virtualtou...

people also can join us for karaoke after dinner. please RSVP for the Karaoke event too. thanks!
item.how_to_find_us: I will have a sign up~

group.name: The Boston Mandarin Chinese Language Meetup Group

item.name: Friday Dinner In Chinatown (Penang)
